predicate.note: Frames file for 'delete' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 10.1.

example.name: no source
example.text: SHAREDATA Inc. said it will amend a registration statement filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission *trace* to delete a plan to sell 500,000 newly issued common shares.
example.arg: a plan to sell 500,000 newly issued common shares

example.name: with source
example.text: American Medical International Inc., a New York hospital operator, will be deleted *trace* from the index at that time.
example.arg: *trace* -> American Medical International Inc., a New York hospital operator ,

example.name: passive/adjectival
example.text: As the violinist tells it, his grandmotherly looking teacher ``put her hands on her hips, stomped her foot and said, `You've just got to get the [expletive deleted *trace*] out of there.'''
